alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 2:03PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT APACHE COUNTY THROUGH 230 PM MST... At 202 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crescent Lake, or 17 miles southwest of Springerville, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cutthroat Campground, Crescent Lake, Rainbow Campground, Apache Trout Campground, and Big Lake. This includes the following highways... State Route 273 between mile markers 388 and 396. State Route 261 between mile markers 395 and 400. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
